name: aggregate-survey-data
description: ## GAME-PLAN #### I. Set up Back End - [ Node.js + Express ] 1. Basic Set up: -   [] Create & Test home route '/'     - REQ: NA     - RES: str HelloWorld -   [] Create & Test Survey '/postSurvey' to GET CSV     - REQ: CSV     - RES: str 'GotSurvey'/'There was a problem getting the survey' -   [] Create & Test function csvToJSON()     - IN: CSV     - OUT: JSON 2. DB Set up: -   [] Create DB Schema ```     --- SurveySchema ---

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
